title: GPU Mining issue
body:
Hi,

  I have a card that has GPU mining issues that shouldn't as far as I can tell it has 4Gb RAM but geth only wants to use 1Gb RAM.   The gpuinfo and gpubench show as ok but when I mine I see;
 WARNING: DAG size (1392507008) larger than device max memory allocation size (1073741824).
You probably have to export GPU_MAX_ALLOC_PERCENT=95
Initialising device 0: GeForce GTX 760

   My environment variables look like this;
GPU_MAX_HEAP_SIZE=95
GO_OPENCL=true
GPU_MAX_ALLOC_PERCENT=95
export GPU_MAX_HEAP_SIZE GO_OPENCL GPU_MAX_ALLOC_PERCENT

Here are the outputs of gpuinfo and gpubench;
